com.viaoa.jfc.text.autocomplete
Class AutoCompleteList

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.jfc.text.autocomplete.AutoCompleteBase
      com.viaoa.jfc.text.autocomplete.AutoCompleteList

public abstract class AutoCompleteList
extends AutoCompleteBase

Autocomplete that uses a JList for the popup component. This is used by OATextFieldAutoCompletList.java Note: abstract methods are used to supply data.

Author:
vincevia
See Also:
to get selected value.

getClosestMatch

protected abstract java.lang.String getClosestMatch(java.lang.String value)
This can be used to auto-fill the remainder of value. Example: if user enters 'abc' and there is a match for 'abcdef', the 'def' can also be filled in. Returning value should be the least that is done.

Specified by:
getClosestMatch in class AutoCompleteBase

onValueSelected

protected void onValueSelected(int pos,
                               java.lang.String value)
Main method to override. Called when an item from Jlist is [clicked], [enter] on, or textField [enter] and there is only one item in Jlist.

Parameters:
pos - in searchData
value - value returned from searchData
